name: hlmulf
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, chlo), wf(c1, cxp(cc, c2), c2))

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, chlo), wf(c1, cxp(cc, c2), c2), wcel(c0, cnv))
stmt.pretty: syl(c0 ∈ CHilOLD, (c1 :(ℂ × c2)→ c2), c0 ∈ NrmCVec)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, chlo), wf(c1, cxp(cc, c2), c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, chlo), wcel(c0, cnv))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wf(c1, cxp(cc, c2), c2))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CHilOLD →(c1 :(ℂ × c2)→ c2))
⊣ (c0 ∈ CHilOLD → c0 ∈ NrmCVec)
⊣ (c0 ∈ NrmCVec →(c1 :(ℂ × c2)→ c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, chlo), wf(c1, cxp(cc, c2), c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, chlo), wcel(c0, cnv))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wf(c1, cxp(cc, c2), c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CHilOLD →(c1 :(ℂ × c2)→ c2))
⊣ (c0 ∈ CHilOLD → c0 ∈ NrmCVec)
⊣ (c0 ∈ NrmCVec →(c1 :(ℂ × c2)→ c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, chlo), wf(c1, cxp(cc, c2), c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wf(c1, cxp(cc, c2), c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CHilOLD →(c1 :(ℂ × c2)→ c2))
⊣ (c0 ∈ NrmCVec →(c1 :(ℂ × c2)→ c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wf(c1, cxp(cc, c2), c2))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cba, c0))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cns, c0))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ NrmCVec →(c1 :(ℂ × c2)→ c2))
⊣ c2 =(BaseSet ` c0)
⊣ c1 =(.sOLD ` c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, chlo), wf(c1, cxp(cc, c2), c2))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cba, c0))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cns, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CHilOLD →(c1 :(ℂ × c2)→ c2))
⊣ c2 =(BaseSet ` c0)
⊣ c1 =(.sOLD ` c0)

comment: Mapping for Hilbert space scalar multiplication. (Contributed by NM, 7-Sep-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
